item.description:
Flex 4 is out and with it comes a whole new approach to building Flex components. Why’d they do it? What does it offer you as a Flex Developer? How does it relate to the old way of doing things? In this session. Jeffry Houser, will answer those questions. It’ll will dissect the Flex 3 component architecture (Halo) and explain how the Flex 4 component architecture (Spark) changes things. Along the way we’ll compare and contrast with some samples.

You can join this meeting at http://experts.na3.ac...



LOGGING IN: When you login to the Connect room (the http://experts.na3.ac... link above)
to view the meeting, PLEASE USE THE "LOGIN AS GUEST" option, and USE YOUR NAME, but do NOT
attempt to use your meetup.com username/password or any Connect account. Just sign in as a guest.
item.name: Halo vs Spark; Flex Component Architecture Showdown - Houston Texas User Group
